function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dynamic simulation approach for simulating supply chain resilience","Impact":"Failure to measure and enhance supply chain resilience","Mitigation":"Regular evaluation and improvement of supply chain resilience","Technologies":"Dynamic simulation models, supply chain management software","People":"Supply chain managers, logistics and transportation personnel","Owner":"Supply chain management team"},{"Description":"Monte Carlo Simulation for studying reservoir resilience","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of reservoir resilience under diverse adversary scenarios","Mitigation":"Continual analysis and assessment of reservoir resilience using Monte Carlo Simulation","Technologies":"Monte Carlo Simulation software, reservoir management tools","People":"Reservoir managers, water resource engineers","Owner":"Reservoir management team"},{"Description":"Time-dependent simulation model for measuring resilience indicators of railway transportation system","Impact":"Inability to assess and improve resilience of railway transportation system","Mitigation":"Regular simulation and assessment of resilience indicators to identify improvement opportunities","Technologies":"Time-dependent simulation software, railway network management tools","People":"Railway transportation system managers, network engineers","Owner":"Railway transportation management team"}]}
